description: Detects when a culture begins outsourcing its wisdom, resilience, or decisions to a dominant narrative, voice, or technology. Flags loss of collective agency.

variables.H(t): Hero narrative saturation (e.g. singular visionary worship)
variables.C(t): Conformity signals (e.g. suppression of dissent, tribal echoing)

response: Collective intelligence thrives on many voices, not one. Revive the forgotten songs, the weird art, the disagreement—it’s part of staying whole.
